request.description:
> Funcionalidad para verificar si el servicio de backend inicio correctamente.  
> - No params required.  
> - No authorization required.  
> - No specific headers.  

Alternative URI
- /woo
- /woo/test
- /woo/ping

- ![Body response expected](https://img.shields.io/badge/Body%20response%20expected-success-009b4f.svg)
